meanings.sent1: The reserver of the last cookie was Sally.
meanings.sent2: The reserver of the best seat in the house arrived early.
meanings.sent3: The reserver of the biggest slice of cake always makes sure to share with others.
meanings.sent4: She was the reserver of secrets, always keeping them safe.
meanings.sent5: The reserver of the final ticket made sure everyone had a chance to attend the show.

meanings.definition: To keep back or save for future use.
meanings.sent1: Please reserver some snacks for the road trip.
meanings.sent2: I will reserver some money for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: He decided to reserver his energy for the big game.
meanings.sent4: She tried to reserver her excitement for the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel would reserver nuts for the winter months.

meanings.definition: A book in which reservations are recorded.
meanings.sent1: The hotel reserver showed all the available rooms.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant reserver listed the upcoming reservations.
meanings.sent3: The library reserver was filled with names for the popular books.
meanings.sent4: The travel agency reserver kept track of all the booked flights.
meanings.sent5: The theater reserver displayed the reserved seats for the performance.
